game_description: Make your own VR games without coding. Play other people's games and create your own. Play with friends, get creative, build any levels or worlds that you want. Deep is easy to learn and fun to play.
review_1: When creating a world it keeps jumping across the world at random, which is frustrating to say the least
review_2: creating worlds made super easy. love the potential of this app. every update brings new cool stuff to play with. so eager to see whats next üî•üëç
review_3: Quite and functional and decent model spawner.
review_4: My youngest instantly loved this app. Great fun for kids!
review_5: Deep gives you the ability to create awesome VR scenes. By being able to manipulate the objects of your choice you can truly create a world of your own imagination. The sheer scale of some objects puts the cherry on top. Highly recommended!!!
